channel.title: Productionbug on Becoming a better Tester!
channel.description: Recent content in Productionbug on Becoming a better Tester!

item.title: Aftermath of Production bug
item.description: Yes, the aftermath. That’s where the game resumes. The update is released.. A Few days pass by fine and we suddenly start getting reports of a few things not working as we promised. “Production issue” they call it. And even before we know the root cause, the famous ritual of ‘Why did the Tester not find it’ starts. Well the production bug could be because we missed: some configs the redirect URLs Cache clearing after logout Time-zone consideration Performance handling Some change of a code to fix a regression issue And many more unrelated to business functionality itself.
